[Y]Gate Array Behaviour
[W]Colour control and timing interplay.
[c][m.]
[W]The Gate Array handles palette and
[W]display mode control and interacts
[W]with timing-sensitive effects.
[W]Cycle-accurate writes are essential
[W]when producing stable raster colour
[W]changes.
[c][m.]
[G]- Pen and border updates.
[G]- Mode control bits.
[G]- Timing-sensitive output.
[m][m-]
[Y]LAB NOTE
[C]One missed cycle can shift an entire
[C]bar.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
